name: VR RunningJoe
description: Running Joe is a racing game you've never experienced before. Please join our journey to the fantastic world! Play single player and controls are simple - Collect coins and diamonds to earn your high score while you drive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core i5 - 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core i5 - 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3700 MB available space
